comments_since_last_sample.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.

My job used to have a requirement of two widgets a day. I missed it a few times so one of my required yearly goals was to hit that average of two or more widgets a day. At the end of every year I’d be at 1.8-1.9 per day. My supervisor wouldn’t ding me for it but one of my goals again was two widgets average. I played that game for years until we finally ditched the goals and eventually the widget requirement. Yearly goals were absolutely a way to get more work out of you for the same pay, there was no reward for hitting goals and you couldn’t use certain things for goals like education or training. It was a dumb stupid scam and absolutely a way to back door in discipline if they didn’t like you.
Another poor LPT. We can do better...

I have never set up an employee and feel insulted by your post. I have always tried to get the most pay for every employee that I manage since I know how screwed they are getters because I see the numbers.

Do not assume everyone is your enemy.
